issue.title: [Rust] Support reading dictionary streams
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10289](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10289). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We support reading dictionaries in the IPC file reader.

We should do the same with the stream reader.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10289?focusedCommentId=17213575) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8450
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8450>
